plot: A terminally ill girl reminisces about happier times, while an emotionally distraught young woman loses herself in an attempt to get even with a deceiving lover.
title: The Green Balloon
plot_es: A terminally ill girl reminisces about happier times, while an emotionally distraught young woman loses herself in an attempt to get even with a deceiving lover.
plot_en: A terminally ill girl reminisces about happier times, while an emotionally distraught young woman loses herself in an attempt to get even with a deceiving lover.
